name: Tower Ascension (Wolfo Dev)
description:
Very early prototype of the game. Full game here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.WolfoGames.TowerAscension
---------

Tower Ascension is a card-based game where your choice-making skills define your destiny.

You'll find yourself entering a dungeon split into four levels, one harder than the other. At the end of each level tehre's a boss you'll have to defeat.

The first few times reaching the end might not seem an easy task. But every attempt allows you to gain permanent GEM coins you can spend at the Store on the Main Menu, increasing your chances of victory.

Good luck!
